name: Dice at the Tavern
description:
Dice at the Tavern is a short interactive Narrative piece done for a 2nd year Portfolio assignment at Falmouth University.

When given the brief of an interactive narrative using the Fungus plugin, I was initially uninspired as I have a love of code. With a little digging around I wrote a script for a dice game called Galleon we'd played while drinking a few times - unfortunately I couldn't make it work through Fungus!

Determined that the idea should stand, I instead implemented a much simpler dice game using the inbuilt Fungus features.

The Brief

> Short (2-3 Minute) Interactive Narrative using Fungus for Unity

> At least 3 Characters (Treating the player as a "Character" counts, thankfully)

> Multiple endings and some thought to audio encouraged but not graded.
